choices.E: They allow access to network services based on department, not physical location.
choices.C: They utilize packet filtering to enhance network security.
choices.D: They can simplify adding, moving, or changing hosts on the network.
choices.B: They provide a low-latency internetworking alternative to routed networks.
choices.A: They establish broadcast domains in switched networks.
choices.F: They provide a method of conserving IP addresses in large networks.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ADE
ADE is correct

questions.question_text: What are three advantages of VLANs? (Choose three.)

Refer to the exhibit. The Bigtime router is unable to authenticate to the Littletime router. What is the cause of the problem?
//IMG//

discussion.content: With CHAP authentication, the configured passwords must be identical on each router.

choices.E: With CHAP authentication, one router must authenticate to another router. The routers cannot be configured to authenticate to each other.
choices.B: The passwords do not match on the two routers.
choices.C: CHAP authentication cannot be used on a serial interface.
choices.D: The routers cannot be connected from interface S0/0 to interface S0/0.
choices.A: The usernames are incorrectly configured on the two routers.

questions.question_text: Which command can you enter to determine whether serial interface 0/2/0 has been configured using HDLC encapsulation?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
. router#show interfaces Serial 0/2/0

Aucune reponse n'est juste
quand on est en
Router(config)# interface vlan 20
Router(config-if)#
on passe en configuration de l'interface

questions.question_text: Which two statements about IPv4 multicast traffic are true? (Choose two.)

choices.B: It uses a minimum amount of network bandwidth.
choices.D: It simultaneously delivers multiple streams of data.
choices.E: It is the most efficient way to deliver data to multiple receivers.
choices.A: It burdens the source host without affecting remote hosts.

discussion.content: FishPasteMan is correct. It is B & E. Multicast is one stream to multiple devices, making D incorrect.
B and E are correct, multicast traffic is one stream to multiple devices
The answer should be D & E.
